typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Roles.Role storage pointer,address) view returns (bool)

nodes.documentation:
Ensure there is no way for the contract to end up with no owner. That sould inadvertently result in
pauser administration becoming impossible. We override this to allways disallow it.
nodes.name: renounceOwnership

nodes.documentation:
@dev allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner
@param newOwner - the address to transfer the ownership to
nodes.name: transferOwnership

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Roles.Role storage pointer,address) view returns (bool)

nodes.documentation:

pauser administration becoming impossible. We override this to allways disallow it.

nodes.documentation:

@param newOwner - the address to transfer the ownership to
nodes.name: transferOwnership

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner

params.newOwner: - the address to transfer the ownership to

renounceOwnership().notice: Ensure there is no way for the contract to end up with no owner. That sould inadvertently result in pauser administration becoming impossible. We override this to allways disallow it.
